edu.wpi.cetask
Class CopyOfShell

java.lang.Object
  edu.wpi.cetask.CopyOfShell

public class CopyOfShell
extends java.lang.Object

A simple command shell for interacting with the task engine.

See Also:
Guide, SpeechGuide

processTaskIf

                             Plan focus,

See Also:
processTask(String,Plan,boolean)

processTask

public Task processTask(java.lang.String args,
                        Plan focus,
                        boolean success)
Return the task instance represented by given shell arguments. JavaScript to compute all declared input and output slot values is required (in order declared). Success slot value is optional (and last). Skipped slots can be specified by '/ /'.

Hint: If Javascript contains '/', use 'eval' command to set temporary variable and use variable in 'done'.

Parameters:
args - [<id> [<namespace>]] [ / <value> ]*
